summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 18932, entitled, "An Ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of Roanoke Street, in the City of Seattle, from the northeasterly margin of a diagonal street, established by Ordinance No. 18517, to the center line of Twenty-fifth Avenue North; and providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor, and providing that the payment for such improvement be made by special assessment upon property benefited, in the manner provided by law."
